title: Need count of facet.pivot on distinct combination
description:
Hi I need to get action wise count in a campaign. Using facet.pivot=campaignId,action to get it.

Ex : campaignId,id,action
       1,1,a
       1,1,a
       1,2,a
       1,2,b

When I do  facet.pivot I get 
{a:3,b:1}
, Facet considers duplicate rows in count.

I need distinct by combination of campaignId,id,action which is 
{a:2,b:1}

Thanks,
